item.title: The US government has shut down. Here's what to know
item.description: The federal government officially entered a shutdown at 12:01 a.m. Wednesday amid an impasse on Capitol Hill over competing congressional spending bil...

item.title: Munich Oktoberfest closed after bomb threat and deadly explosion, police say
item.description: Police in the southern German city of Munich said the famous Oktoberfest event would be closed until Wednesday afternoon.

item.title: At least 69 people killed in a powerful earthquake that hit the Philippines
item.description: At least 69 people have been killed in a powerful earthquake that hit the Philippines

item.title: WATCH: Carnival ride malfunctions at California school event
item.description: Riders were reportedly trapped for up to an hour after a carnival ride malfunction at a school event in Southern California. No injuries were reported...

item.title: WATCH: President Trump calls on Hamas to accept peace proposal
item.description: The president called on Hamas to accept what he called an "extremely fair" proposal to end the war in Gaza and return the hostages to Israel.
